description:
Rod Daily is riding solo in the garden, hanging with the birds and the bees, and surrounded by the fresh foliage of spring in full bloom. But the flowers aren't the only things blossoming, as Rod is budding as well, with a stem standing straight up and ready to spill forth its flower. He hasn't a worry in the world, and why should he? It's gorgeous outside, there's a fragrant smell in the air, and the mood is perfect for laying some Daily seed.

Enjoy!
title: Rod & Roses
